block.p: It was the worst terrorist attack in the Philippines in three years, a bomb at an airport that killed 21 people -- including an American Baptist missionary -- and injured 150. It could have been the work of any number of armed groups that have made the southern island of Mindanao a tinderbox. Authorities blamed the largest of four Muslim insurgencies, the Moro Islamic Liberation Front, which has been fighting for a separate state for 25 years.
